original_body_lines: Ceylinco General Insurance was honored as the sole general insurer at LMD’s recent outstanding corporate awards, celebrating the magazine’s 30th anniversary. The event recognized 25 top corporates in Sri Lanka, highlighting those ranked 1st, 2nd and 3rd in LMD’s annual rankings over the past three decades. This accolade highlights the company’s commitment to excellence and its significant role in the Sri Lankan insurance industry. The recognition also reflects its consistent performance and leadership over the years.

Commenting on the achievement, Dr. Jagath Alwis, Chairman, emphasized the organization’s commitment to adding value and supporting individuals, especially during challenging economic times. He highlighted the importance of the company’s customer-centric approach and innovative insurance solutions, which form the foundation of their success. Additionally, he noted that the “Ceylinco VIP On The Spot” vehicle insurance policies offer a range of unique benefits that sets them apart in the market. The company has built a strong reputation for swift claim settlement, with most of the claims settled “On The Spot”. This commitment ensures that customers receive the support they need without unnecessary delays, reinforcing the trust and reliability associated with the brand.

Rex Gunatilake, Director / Chief Executive Officer said, “These awards demonstrate that Ceylinco General Insurance touches the lives of people across Sri Lanka, earning their trust and loyalty for being a partner that delivers its promises. Earlier this year, Ceylinco General Insurance introduced yet another industry first and commenced the delivery of ‘Ceylinco VIP On The Spot’ vehicle insurance policies at customers’ doorsteps within 24 hours of receiving a call to its toll free number 1334, at no extra cost.”

Ceylinco General Insurance was also chosen as the ‘People’s Insurance Brand of The Year’ for General insurance at the 2024 SLIM Kantar People’s Awards for an unprecedented 18th consecutive year. Winning the ‘People’s General Insurance Brand of The Year’ further demonstrates that Ceylinco General Insurance is closely intertwined with people’s lives as a trustworthy and a dependable brand that keeps its promises.
